org.activity.util

Class RegexUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.activity.util.RegexUtils

  • public class RegexUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    To improve regex related performances by precompiling regexes. can be used for string splits
    Author:
    gunjan

      to find out how many times this method is being called when a variable in declaration calls it.
      static void stringSplitPerformance()
      The execution of this method shows that using precompile pattern to split string is relatively faster than using String.split() or compiling pattern each time with Pattern.split()

        public static void stringSplitPerformance()
